name: phonetics
description: Use words related to hard phonetics and pronunciation

name: articles
description: Use indefinite, definite, and partitive articles, like 'un', 'une', 'le', 'la', 'les', 'du', 'de la', 'des'

name: personal pronouns subject
description: Use personal pronouns in sentences, like 'je', 'tu', 'il', 'elle', 'nous', 'vous', 'ils', 'elles'

name: personal pronouns (on)
description: Use the impersonal pronoun 'on' in sentences

name: possessive adjectives
description: Use possessive adjectives in sentences, like 'mon', 'ma', 'mes', 'ton', 'ta', 'tes', 'son', 'sa', 'ses', 'notre', 'votre', 'leur'

name: demonstrative adjectives
description: Use demonstrative adjectives in sentences, like 'ce', 'cet', 'cette', 'ces'

name: first group verbs
description: Use verbs of the first group

name: second group verbs
description: Use verbs of the second group

name: third group verbs
description: Use verbs of the third group

name: pronominal verbes
description: Use pronominal in sentences, like 'se réveiller', 'se laver', 'se préparer'

name: negations
description: Use negation in sentences, like 'ne pas', 'ne plus' 'ne jamais'

name: adverbs of frequency
description: Use adverbs of frequency, like 'often', 'sometimes' 'from time to time'
